system.description:
This spell protects the recipient from all non-magical environmental damage, allowing them to endure extreme conditions without harm.

Protection Effects:

  • Prevents damage from normal heat or cold.
  • Eliminates the need for air, food, water, or sleep while active.
  • Protects against all natural environmental hazards, even in other planes of existence.

Limitations:

  • Does not protect against magical damage of any kind.
  • Does not prevent damage from attacks, poisons, breath weapons, or physical blows.

Example Uses:

  • Desert or Blizzard: Prevents harm from extreme temperatures.
  • Underwater or Underground: Enables survival without air.
  • Space Travel: Protects against vacuum exposure.
  • Elemental Plane of Fire: Prevents conditional fire damage from the natural environment.
system.effect: Protects one creature against non-magical environmental damage
